|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3206EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;STM32F100C8; |flash2size = 64 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Broadcom;BCM53322;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 8 KiB |ram2chip = STMicro;STM32F100C8;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|sw_cpu = true |sw2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|eth_ports = 10 |eth_speed = 1GbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = supported |sup_jumbo = unspecified |sw_class = smart
|exp_if_types = SFP |exp_sfp_num = 2

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Integrated Power Over Ethernet PSE Controller;Broadcom;BCM59111;;2;,,, 802.3at integrated PoE-PD interface and PWM controller;STMicro;PM8803;;1;,,, 75V, 0.5A Step-Down Switching Regulator;National Semi;LM5574;;1;,,, Hot Swappable, Dual I2C Isolator;Analog Devices;ADuM1250;;1;,,, 30V/17A N-Channel MOSFET;Sinopower;SM4833;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-816;;1;,,, |flags = Smart switch, PoE Switch, 2x SFP/RJ45 Combo port, heatsink, metal case, |accessible_UART =
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2013 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B00E6IJO6S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM53322 :Switch Controller w/ Embedded CPU and RAM *Co-processor: [[STMicro]] [https://www.st.com/en/microcontrollers-microprocessors/stm32f100c8.html STM32F100C8] ARM Cortex-M3 to manage PoE *Flash: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, *LAN: 8x Gigabit (RJ45) 802.3af PoE Ethernet ports, :2x GbE SFP/RJ45 Shared slots, :20Gbps switching capacity *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 61W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:EnGenius EGS2110P.jpeg|Main board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
